resources.string:
==Discovery== **Discovered by:** Brown et al; Ortiz et al (neither official)
 **Discovery date:** 2004 December 28 (Brown et al); 2005 July (Ortiz et al)
==Orbital characteristics== **Distance from sun:** 6,452 million km (43.1 AU)
 **Aphelion:** 7,710 million km (51.5 AU)
 **Perihelion:** 5,194 million km (34.7 AU)
 **Eccentricity:** 0.195
 **Orbital period:** 283.28 years
 **Average orbital speed:** 4.484 km/s
 **Inclination to ecliptic:** 28.22°
 **Satellites:** 2
==Physical characteristics== **Dimensions:** ~1,960 × 1,518 × 996 km (Keck)
 **Mean radius:** ~718 km
 575^^+125^^,,−50,, km (Spitzer)
 762 ± 83 km (Hershel)
 **Mass:** (4.006 ± 0.040)×10^^21^^ kg
 **Mean density:** 2.6–3.3 g/cm³
 **Equatorial surface gravity:** 0.44 m/s²
 **Escape velocity:** 0.84 km/s
 **Sidereal rotation period:** 3h 54m 56s
 **Albedo:** 0.7 - 0.94 (estimated)
 **Temperature:** <50K
 **Spectral type (Neutral):** B-V=0.64, V-R=0.33 B0-V0=0.646


Find out more on [[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Haumea_(dwarf_planet)|wikipedia]].
